<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">      Obj&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;kind&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93; = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;varbit&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">      Obj&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;var&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93; = Var-&gt;getName();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">      Obj&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;index&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93; = VarBit-&gt;getBitNum();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::move(Obj);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Dag = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;DagInit&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">    Obj&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;kind&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93; = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;dag&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">    Obj&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;operator&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93; = translateInit(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5ada09b995722faae2fac3dacfddd27999">Dag</a>-&gt;getOperator());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/smeabipass-cpp/#a8f8f80d37794cde9472343e4487ba3eb">name</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5ada09b995722faae2fac3dacfddd27999">Dag</a>-&gt;getName())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">      Obj&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;name&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/smeabipass-cpp/#a8f8f80d37794cde9472343e4487ba3eb">name</a>-&gt;getAsUnquotedString();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array">json::Array</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/key/#a1958a762261549463a280bac3274d6d5">Args</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx = 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5ada09b995722faae2fac3dacfddd27999">Dag</a>-&gt;getNumArgs(); Idx &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++Idx) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array">json::Array</a> Arg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">      Arg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array/#ad48bca6da17d659a87749a8bf543e35b">push&#95;back</a>(translateInit(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5ada09b995722faae2fac3dacfddd27999">Dag</a>-&gt;getArg(Idx)));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ArgName = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5ada09b995722faae2fac3dacfddd27999">Dag</a>-&gt;getArgName(Idx))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">        Arg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array/#ad48bca6da17d659a87749a8bf543e35b">push&#95;back</a>(ArgName-&gt;getAsUnquotedString());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">        Arg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array/#ad48bca6da17d659a87749a8bf543e35b">push&#95;back</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/key/#a1958a762261549463a280bac3274d6d5">Args</a>.push&#95;back(std::move(Arg));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">    Obj&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;args&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93; = std::move(Args);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::move(Obj);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Final fallback: anything that gets past here is simply given a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// kind field of &#39;complex&#39;, and the only other field is the standard</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#39;printable&#39; representation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.isConcrete());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">  Obj&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;kind&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93; = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;complex&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::move(Obj);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-jsonbackend-cpp-/jsonemitter/#a410599bd3c103f2faa1069c91ae02b57"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-jsonbackend-cpp-/jsonemitter/#a410599bd3c103f2faa1069c91ae02b57">JSONEmitter::run</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/object">json::Object</a> Root;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">  Root&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;!tablegen&#95;json&#95;version&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93; = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Prepare the arrays that will list the instances of every class.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We mostly fill those in by iterating over the superclasses of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// each def, but we also want to ensure we store an empty list for a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// class with no instances at all, so we do a preliminary iteration</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// over the classes, invoking std::map::operator&#91;&#93; to default-</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// construct the array for each one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::map&lt;std::string, json::Array&gt; InstanceLists;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;ClassName, ClassRec&#93; : Records.getClasses())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">    InstanceLists.emplace(ClassRec-&gt;getNameInitAsString(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array">json::Array</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Main iteration over the defs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;DefName, Def&#93; : Records.getDefs()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::string Name = Def-&gt;getNameInitAsString();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/object">json::Object</a> Obj;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array">json::Array</a> Fields;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recordval">RecordVal</a> &amp;RV : Def-&gt;getValues()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Def-&gt;isTemplateArg(RV.getNameInit())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Name = RV.getNameInitAsString();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RV.isNonconcreteOK())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">          Fields.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array/#ad48bca6da17d659a87749a8bf543e35b">push&#95;back</a>(Name);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">        Obj&#91;Name&#93; = translateInit(&#42;RV.getValue());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">    Obj&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;!fields&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93; = std::move(Fields);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array">json::Array</a> SuperClasses;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add this def to the instance list for each of its superclasses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/classes/superclass">SuperClass</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>&#93; : Def-&gt;getSuperClasses()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::string SuperName = <a href="/docs/api/classes/superclass">SuperClass</a>-&gt;getNameInitAsString();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">      SuperClasses.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array/#ad48bca6da17d659a87749a8bf543e35b">push&#95;back</a>(SuperName);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">      InstanceLists&#91;SuperName&#93;.push&#95;back(Name);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">    Obj&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;!superclasses&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93; = std::move(SuperClasses);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    Obj&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;!name&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93; = Name;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    Obj&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;!anonymous&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93; = Def-&gt;isAnonymous();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array">json::Array</a> Locs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a> : Def-&gt;getLoc())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">      Locs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array/#ad48bca6da17d659a87749a8bf543e35b">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f3f23062c5d5636bee27c54f4a407f0">SrcMgr</a>.getFormattedLocationNoOffset(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">    Obj&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;!locs&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93; = std::move(Locs);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">    Root&#91;Name&#93; = std::move(Obj);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make a JSON object from the std::map of instance lists.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/object">json::Object</a> InstanceOf;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;ClassName, Instances&#93; : InstanceLists)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">    InstanceOf&#91;ClassName&#93; = std::move(Instances);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">  Root&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;!instanceof&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93; = std::move(InstanceOf);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Done. Write the output.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  OS &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/value">json::Value</a>(std::move(Root)) &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
